title: I-800 | Petition to Classify Convention Adoptee as an Immediate Relative
description: Use this form to determine the child's eligibility for classification as a Convention adoptee.

forms.title: Form I-800 Supplement 1 (Consent to Disclose Information)

filings.category: If you file more than one Form I-800 during your Form I-800A, Application for Determination of Suitability to Adopt a Child from a Convention Country, approval period, for children who are not birth siblings before the proposed adoption.
